Trigger.Name: Party List Settings - copy to Startup Folder

Action.Description: Party List Position - Move this aura to where you want the initial auras to appear. Note: If the pictures in this aura don't line up well in your party list, you will need to edit the vertical padding variable action, or change your party list element size in your FFXIV HUD.
Padding value - how much horizontal space to put between each icon - Default 27
Padding value - how much vertical space to put between each icon - Default 40
Aura grow direction: -1 is left, 1 is right
Width & Height value - determines the size of each icon - Default 25
Opacity value - determines the transparency of each icon - Default 100

Trigger.Name: ## INSTRUCTIONS - SEE DESCRIPTION TAB
Trigger.Description:
These triggers are based on Dansa's HoT triggers, with additional customization and functionality added by SableCentaur. 1. Make sure your party list order in FFXIV matches your configured party order in Triggernometry's settings. Addendum: For now, the Telesto plugin for Dalamud is required for this repo to work properly. Please install it before trying to use this repo. https://github.com/paissaheavyindustries/Dalamud-Repo 2. Copy the Party List Settings to your Triggernometry startup folder and disable it in the remote repository. 3. Open the settings trigger and configure it. Open the Party List Position action and use the visual guide for placement to place the aura. After moving the aura to the desired location, right click the image and click Save Settings. Each of the other actions in these triggers are labeled as to what settings they change.
To turn off auras for abilities you don't care about, find the relevant ability in folders inside the MultiCooldowns folder Enable/disable the triggers as desired. All the triggers are designed for use at level 90. I don't plan to support them at levels below that, but if you make a fix, pull requests are welcome.
Support for these triggers is limited, but questions/comments/suggestions may be DM'd to SableCentaur#1297 on Discord. If your question is answered in these instructions or in Triggernometry's FAQ, I will not answer.

Trigger.Name: updates - see description tab
Trigger.Description:
Planned: remove character name references from regex add suggested abilities (currently disabled triggers) clean up disabled actions
9.17.22 revamped RDM melee combo; now tracks the gcds instead of showing an arbitrary timer will cancel itself if the RDM breaks their combo by casting a spell or letting their combo fall off added trick attack adjusted cd initialize trigger to better accomodate for "counter" cds, now is less likely to erroneously clear variables removed references to player names in variables and trigger logic; still needs to be removed from regex
9.16.22 added functionality for "counter" abilities when buff is active, aura shows number of stacks remaining instead of duration left when buff falls off, aura will switch to showing CD ex. Soteria, Manafication, Delirium, Blood Weapon, Requiescat. also affects Technical Step added functionality for other abilities that can end early but don't have stacks when buff is active, aura shows time left until it ends automatically when buff falls off or ability is ended, aura will switch to showing CD for abilities that trigger other buffs (regen from arcane crest, invuln from living dead, etc), these effects will show up as a separate aura from the original ability's cooldown ex. Macrocosmos, Earthly Star, Living Dead, Arcane Crest, Divine Veil added customizability to party list settings new options include changing the width/height and opacity of icons text size customizability is impossible for now :( to use these new options, copy and paste a new copy of the Party List Settings trigger to the startup folder and customize as desired actions with multiple charges now use a single trigger to queue aura activation most of these triggers still have disabled actions, will clean these up later after ensuring consistency as a result of this change, there are much fewer messy variables left over when exiting duties! removed outdated references to DoT tracker simplified HoT logic converted all triggers to use network lines added Telesto compatibility to allow for continued use until Trig party data populates correctly again https://github.com/paissaheavyindustries/Triggernometry/issues/71 if/when this is fixed, it should be possible to go back to using it without Telesto with no updates needed updated level requirement to show Kerachole as a regen for SGE added new abilities to track AST - Draw, Exaltation, BLM - Amplifier, PLD - Divine Veil, SGE - Physis added wipe command to allow easier testing and cleanup reorganized folders to make abilities easier to find, and backend/aura commands less intrusive updated instructions fixed bug with reprisal

Trigger.Name: RDM Enchanted Combo Counter
Trigger.Description:
use counters - enchanted riposte/moulinet sets counter to 5, each enchanted action/finisher reduces counter by 1 if gcd other than enchanted riposte>zwerchhau>redoublement>verflare/verholy>scorch>resolution used, ends counter (also if uses them out of order maybe?) can start using moulinet as any of the melee gcds too, moulinet is a gain to do at 3 targets for all 3 combos, but if you start with 1 target and then get more you can do riposte into moulinet into moulinet if the moulinets hit 3+ both times - a loss otherwise moulinet is a gain over zwerchhau at 3, redoublement at 4
so enchanted riposte/moulinet > enchanted riposte/zwerchhau/moulinet > enchanted riposte/zwerchhau/moulinet/redoublement > verflare/verholy > scorch > resolution any other gcd breaks the combo

Trigger.Name: Drop Hot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^30\|(?:[^|]*\|){2}(?<skill>(Aspected Benefic|Aspected Helios|The Bole|The Spire|The Ewer|The Balance|The Arrow|The Spear))\|[^|]*\|[^|]*\|(?<name>[^|]*)\|(?<eid>[A-F0-9]{8})\|(?<ename>[^|]*)\|

Activates Image Aura - Uses Triggernometry Party List, currently broken
